name: HYENA

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.text: The hyena has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the hyena's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee Attack Roll: +2, reach 5 ft. Hit: 3 (1d6) Piercing damage.

raw_text:

Speed 50 ft.
MOD 	SAVE

DEX 	13 	+1 	+1
CON 	12 	+1 	+1
MOD 	SAVE
INT 	2 	−4 	−4
WIS 	12 	+1 	+1
CHA 	5 	−3 	−3
Skills Perception +3
Senses Darkvision 60 ft.; Passive Perception 13
Languages None
CR 0 (XP 10; PB +2)
Traits
Pack Tactics. The hyena has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if
at least one of the hyena’s allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally
doesn’t have the Incapacitated condition.
Actions
Bite. Melee Attack Roll: +2, reach 5 ft.
Hit: 3 (1d6) Piercing damage.
Medium Beast, Unaligned
